New Zealand Herald https://www.nzherald.co.nz New Zealand Herald News Feed 2024 年 8 月 19 日星期一 22:12:56 +0000 zh 1每小时1
New ‘Coromandel-centric’ film festival to highlight region https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/new-coromandel-centric-film-festival-to-highlight-region/LY4VFGQ6UNCSZHV7FNA3BUTQEI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/new-coromandel-centric-film-festival-to-highlight-region/LY4VFGQ6UNCSZHV7FNA3BUTQEI/ Al WilliamsCoromandel will hit the big screen at an upcoming film festival. Mon, 19 Aug 2024 22:00:00 +0000 Anton Steel’s film The Z Nail Gang is based on real events in Kūaotunu when a group of locals fought back against an international mining company with plans to dig an open-cast gold mine in the area. Photo / John Borren
Mt Roskill McDonald’s begins clean-up after every window is broken https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/mt-roskill-mcdonalds-begins-clean-up-after-every-window-is-broken/OUN2L7O6WBBCZCFVC33RB3KT6A/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/mt-roskill-mcdonalds-begins-clean-up-after-every-window-is-broken/OUN2L7O6WBBCZCFVC33RB3KT6A/ Rachel Maher'Every single window is broken from the drive-through to the entrance.' Mon, 19 Aug 2024 21:48:04 +0000 The McDonald's on Stoddard Rd, Mt Roskill, has had it's windows blown out overnight. Photo / Apulu Mamoe Kaisala.
Philip Polkinghorne murder trial live updates: Testimony resumes after jurors given day off https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/philip-polkinghorne-murder-trial-live-updates-testimony-resumes-after-jurors-given-day-off/DJRZOM7R6JCRJJ5KBZBREV2RZA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/philip-polkinghorne-murder-trial-live-updates-testimony-resumes-after-jurors-given-day-off/DJRZOM7R6JCRJJ5KBZBREV2RZA/ Craig Kapitan, George BlockThe jury weren't required in the High Court yesterday. Mon, 19 Aug 2024 21:30:05 +0000 Eye surgeon Philip Polkinghorne arrives at the High Court at Auckland for the beginning of week three in his murder trial. He is accused of having strangled wife Pauline Hanna. Photo / Jason Oxenham
